item.title: She saw a car-sized object over a Texas farm and found wayward hunk of NASA equipment
item.description: A West Texas woman saw something unusual on a recent morning, a massive parachute drifting slowly across the sky

item.title: A grim list: Some notable attacks on houses of worship around the world in recent years
item.description: Houses of worship have faced various types of attacks throughout history, but such assaults are not relics of the past

item.title: Fear and vigilance rise as attacks on houses of worship intensify worldwide
item.description: Statistically, attending a weekly worship service is a remarkably safe thing to do

item.title: Subtropical Storm Karen forms far from land in the north Atlantic Ocean
item.description: Subtropical Storm Karen forms far from land in the north Atlantic Ocean

item.title: Man convicted of killing a 15-year-old girl in 2001 is executed in Indiana
item.description: Indiana officials have executed a man convicted in the 2001 rape and murder of a teenage girl
